title: Fleshrender
content:
he got such a bollocking from his friends that he named it Fleshrender instead, and sulked for a whole tenday afterward.

Shortsword Light Finesse

Fleshrender is one of the Shortsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Fleshrender is a tactical enchanted weapon that allows you to make an opponent unable to heal.
